main event: A flying cigar-shaped object was observed over Haifa, Palestine on December 25, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed by four men returning from work in a quarry.
The object was fairly low and moved at great speed, disappearing in 50-60 seconds after changing direction.
Two flying saucers were also seen over Mt. Carmel the previous Tuesday by several persons.
This is a preliminary report, and further information and verification has been requested from the foreign liaison office.
The object was previously reported as a 'flying cigar' over Haifa.
witnesses: four men returning from work in a quarry
